title: How do I change my server?
body: I want to transfer my account to LAN but I can't find the option in the shop

replies.body:
You can access account services in the store by clicking on the Account Icon in the store. Here's a screenshot to assist you:

(Click to enlarge)
http://imgur.com/a/PXnQj

Be sure to check out our [Account Transfer FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751924-Account-Transfer-FAQ) for more information. Let me know if you have any questions~
